meanings.definition: To become aware of something or someone by seeing or hearing them.
meanings.sent1: She notices the bird singing outside her window.
meanings.sent2: He always notices when his dog wants to play.
meanings.sent3: The cat notices the mouse and starts to chase it.
meanings.sent4: The detective notices a small detail that solves the case.
meanings.sent5: The teacher notices the student's hard work and praises them.

meanings.sent1: The notices about the school play were posted on the bulletin board.
meanings.sent2: She read the notice about the upcoming event in the newspaper.
meanings.sent3: The notice on the door informed visitors about the new opening hours.
meanings.sent4: The notice on the wall reminded everyone about the safety rules.
meanings.sent5: The notice on the website announced the winner of the contest.

meanings.sent1: He notices the warning signs and acts accordingly.
meanings.sent2: She always notices the beautiful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The child notices the colorful balloons and gets excited.
meanings.sent4: The hiker notices the change in weather and decides to head back.
meanings.sent5: The chef notices the missing ingredient and quickly replaces it.
